name: Army of Squirrels
description: Get ready for apocalyptic war between squirrels and robots! The forest is invaded by monstrous robots led by evil humans. With fearless squirrel soldiers your mission is to conquer devastated warzone back to nature!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core CPU 2.0Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 videocard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space
